list_definition.definition: a token used in numbering or playing certain games
(with to) in the opposite direction or manner to

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The emerging election results are running counter to most forecasts.

list_definition.definition: to meet or answer (a stroke or move etc by another)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He successfully countered all the criticisms that were directed at him.

list_definition.definition: a kind of table or surface on which goods are laid

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Can you get me some sweets from the confectionery counter?
